name: ttyd-ubuntu
short_description: Share your terminal over the web — runs a bash shell in Ubuntu Linux accessible from any browser.
description: Share your terminal over the web — runs a bash shell in Ubuntu Linux accessible from any browser. ttyd-ubuntu is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, pastebin, sharing. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host ttyd-ubuntu on your home server to share your terminal over the web — runs a bash shell in ubuntu linux accessible from any browser without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use ttyd-ubuntu to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
